item.title: All My Loving Ukulele Play Along - Key of D
item.description:
For Educational Use. All My Loving by the Beatles. Key of D: Em, A7, D, Bm, G, C, A#+.
The original performances of this song seem to be in E or E-flat, both which are not great keys for ukulele. The final video comes from this YouTube Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nMYfVuneBPU
I lowered the key to D; the Key of C is a better key for ukulele players with this song--but the audio starts sounding strange when you change pitch more than a whole step. Therefore, I apologize for the A#+ chord.
Ukulele fonts are from Chordette for Education, found at ukefarm.com
